Package sprite

package sprite
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Block
    A tile inside a mine that, when mined, gives the player coins.
    Bomb
    A type of block that when mined, causes the player to lose coins and removes adjacent blocks in the mine.
    Chest
    Block that when mined has a random chance to give the player a piece of equipment out of a pool of different equipment.
    Equipment
    Represents the equipment that the Gambledorf uses, with each piece of equipment having a different mine power value, and rarities
    Gambledorf
    A interactable character that can move up, down, left, and right, and mine blocks.
    Sprite
    Represents any object that moves and is affected by gravity
